description: In this introductory Jewelry Design Series, brought to you by Modnitsa Atelier, you will learn how to create stunning earrings and necklaces. With access to 2 Beginner and 2 Intermediate Workshops, normally taught in our Manhattan studio, you will be introduced to proper construction and design techniques, ranging from head pin creation, wire wrapping connection, stringing, finishing, color theory, design basics, as well as materials and tools and do's and don'ts. Interactive and fun, these courses are meant to spark your creativity and allow you to explore color and style, while perfecting your new hobby.
title: Modnitsa Atelier Jewelry Design Intro Video Series
